Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States

Class SynchronousGameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.GameState
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.SynchronousGameState
Direct Known Subclasses:
DrawInitialCards, MainLoop
public abstract class SynchronousGameState extends GameState
Represents a synchronous state in the game where actions are performed by players in a turn-based manner.
This abstract class extends GameState and provides functionality for managing player turns. Concrete states that require synchronous behavior should extend this class.

  • Method Details

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(Player player)
      Removes a player from the game and updates the current player index accordingly.
      If the removed player is the current player, it finds the next player to take the turn.
      Overrides:
      removePlayer in class GameState
      Parameters:
      player - The player to remove.
